description:
Hoodie, tee, jeans, and you’re set. Heading out or staying in, a soft hoodie goes a long way to guaranteeing comfort. Made from a fleecy cotton and recycled poly blend, the KMD hoodie holds onto your natural heat, breathes well, and wicks away moisture.

  • Cotton and recycled poly blend wears well and dries faster than full cotton hoodies
  • Low-profile adjustable hood is there when the temperature drops
  • Kangaroo pocket keeps your hands out of the cold
  • Uses Better Cotton Initiative (BCI) cotton. The BCI is a not-for-profit association committed to a holistic approach to sustainable cotton production
  • Certified B Corporation: certified to meet the highest standards of social and environmental impact
  • Regular fit wears like and old favourite
name: Kathmandu KMD Logo Hoodie - Men's
